frameDefinitions: An object (the Theme) moves away from a Source.
An Agent, by virtue of strength or forcefulness, controls, rules, or strongly influences some Patient in some Situation.
An Agent acts so as to be the strongest force, or most important causal factor in some Situation, to the exclusion of other competing actors.
An Event with multiple Participants takes place.
A Helper benefits a Benefited_party by enabling the culmination of a Goal that the Benefited_party has.
An individual or organization, the Front, serves as a cover for an Illicit_activity or an Illicit_organization.
frameExamples: The fireballing righthander looked poised to <t>dominate</t> the Yankees yet again, striking out seven straight batters during one stretch
York <t>dominated</t> the game as they held the ball on offense almost the entire 70 minutes.
MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
Will you <t>help</t> the Government find your brother?
The laundromat is a <t>front</t> for the Yakuza.
listRoleDefinitions: This is the object which moves. It may be an entity which moves under its own power, but it need not be.

All the verbs in this frame express some change of location, away from one place and to another. Any constituent that expresses the initial position of the <fen>Theme</fen>, before the change of location, is tagged with <fen>Source</fen>. Often the <fen>Source</fen> is understood from context.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the departure takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location in which the departing takes place.
The <fen>Agent</fen> controls the Patient by being forceful and possibly aggressive.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is trying to gain control of a situation, but ends up being subject to the control and influence of the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The time when the domination takes place.
The place where the domination occurs.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the most forceful and pivotal factor in the situation.
The <fen>Situation</fen> is primarily affected by the <fen>Agent</fen>, in particular how it develops or concludes.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> is dominant.
The location where the domination takes place.
The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Benefited_party</fen> receives a benefit from the action of the <fen>Helper</fen>.
The <fen>Helper</fen> performs some action that benefits the <fen>Benefited_party</fen>.
The desirable state of affairs that the <fen>Benefited_party</fen> is involved in and which is enabled by the <fen>Helper</fen>.
This role identifies a <fen>Focal_entity</fen> involved in achieving the <fen>Goal</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Assistance occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Assistance occurs.
The <fen>Front</fen> acts as a legitimate individual, organization, or enterprise, but is truly a cover for an illicit organization or activity.
The existence and activities of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> are concealed by the <fen>Front</fen>.
The <fen>Illicit_activity</fen> of the <fen>Illicit_organization</fen> is concealed by (the activities of) the <fen>Front</fen> .
The time at which the deceptive activity occurs
The place where the fronting occurs.
listRoleExamples: Their role models might have dominated women <fex>in the past</fex>; they may not have understood the concept of equality.
Women tend to dominatemen <fex>at home and at Church</fex>.
As discussed above, Ford dominated the market <fex>in the 1920s</fex>, then left the business to create production capacity for the Model A.
Indeed, <fex>in all Latin America</fex>, United States corporations dominated the key sectors of the economy.
Thereafter, <fex>everybody</fex> participated in the 17 May parade ending in the Nordic Club.
Last year, <fex>Bill</fex> participated in the Montana State University Earth Systems Science distance learning course in the Atmosphere Unit.

The Second Amended Complaint alleges that Andrew S. Pitt ('Pitt'), Conectisys Corporation ('Conectisys' or the 'Company'), and BM
Capital Corp. participated <fex>with Zaman and Smith Benton</fex> in a fraudulent and manipulative trading scheme.
Some who participated <fex>in D-Day</fex> are finally ready to talk about it
Several of the countries were unable to participate <fex>in the market</fex> .

A survey of students who participated <fex>last year</fex> showed that 61 percent would be the
first in their family to attend college.
The most exciting tours for Mr. Osako were when he participated <fex>in France, Belgium, Holland, Cuba and Japan</fex>.
Whoever didn't cook has to help <fex>with the dishes</fex>.
The police assisted Harry in finding his cat <fex>on Wednesday afternoon</fex>.
The police assisted Harry in finding his cat <fex>in front of his house</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: El Macca: Four Years with Real Madrid
